headline: Bloom Energy Is Already the Fuel-Cell King. It’s Setting Its Sights Much Higher.
summary: Bloom Energy’s  latest earnings report cemented its status as a major data-center power player, highlighting how it isn’t a niche clean-energy company anymore.  The maker of fuel cells is aiming to take market share from companies such as  GE Vernova  the big dogs of power production.  Bloom Energy stock rose 2% in early trading Friday as investors parsed its fourth-quarter financial results, disclosed late Thursday.

headline: Bloom Energy Surges On AEP Deal AI Backlog And Valuation Questions
summary: Bloom Energy (NYSE:BE) secured a $2.65b agreement with American Electric Power to supply power solutions. The company reported record quarterly results, including its highest product backlog to date. Bloom expanded its presence in the AI data center market through new power infrastructure partnerships. For investors tracking NYSE:BE, these announcements come with the shares recently closing at $136.60. The stock is up 32.6% over the past month and 38.4% year to date, with a very large 1...

headline: Bloom Energy, The Clean Energy Choice For AI Data Centers, Soars On Outlook; Amazon Announces AI Spending
summary: Bloom Energy stock tumbled Wednesday and continued to retreat Thursday prior to the Q4 earnings release after the stock market close.
